content_comps.Title: Backend Developers
content_comps.Desc:
If you're a backend developer interested in joining our team, simply contact us on Discord!

Please make sure to bring references of your previous work as well as the confidence to have our users' money depend on your knowledge.

content_comps.Title: Marketing
content_comps.Desc: If you're someone driving lead-generation in the numbers of vaulted primes' prices, we will probably have a place for you in our team soon! As of now, we have no urgent need of someone specializing in marketing - But if you think you can convince us otherwise, join us on Discord.
